description: In your human form you no longer need to deal with your encumbering paws.
In your human form your snout is concealed. You can once again wear masks of any kind.
In your human form your padded feet are fully concealed. Any benefits confered by them are also temporarily suspended.
In your human form your legs have returned to normal. Any benefits confered from your digitgrade legs are also temporarily suspended.
In your human form your nails have returned to a normal length. Any benefits confered from them are also temporarily suspended.
In your human form your claws have returned to a normal fingernails. Any benefits confered from them are also temporarily suspended.
In your human form your fur is concealed. Any benefits confered by are temporarily suspended.
In your human form your fur is concealed. Any benefits confered by are temporarily suspended.
You have completly normal human ears now. Your hearing has returned to normal as well.
With your fur concealed it's enchantment has been temporarily surpressed
With your fur concealed it's enchantment has been temporarily surpressed
You have concealed your muzzle revealing a normal human face, if a bit fox-like.
Your tails are concealed while you are in human form. Any mana benefits you recieve from them are temporarily halved.
